availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Harry Smith Homans (California/New York Life Insurance Agent)

body.p: Sacramento, California, clerk and commissioner of deeds. Pennsylvania native. Clerk in Sacramento in 1860. Commissioner of Deeds for the Commonwealth of Kentucky in California in 1864.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, California, Sacramento County, Sacramento Ward 2, p. 91; Find A Grave, "Harry Smith Homans (1838-1889)," Memorial #93851955, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=93851955&ref=acom (accessed March 29, 2017); KYR-0001-007-0314.
